name: The Hunky Bunker Chronicles: Chapter 4
description:
This chapter of the PRPG, The Hunky Bunker Chronicles, includes branching pathways. Make your decisions carefully to help Bunky become the World's Greatest!

P.S. I don't mean to offend any furries playing the game. This is all satire and purely a parody of the culture. I wish no ill will in the use of the term "Furry" and I hope it doesn't offend anyone.
